vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Pie.Get (patch_10.sol#8-13) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- Owner.transfer(this.balance) (patch_10.sol#10)
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_10.sol#11)

solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_10.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_10.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls

Low level call in Pie.Command (patch_10.sol#25-29):
